title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
description: When attempting to export data from a table that is located inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown. The description of the exception is not provided.
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table inside a grid cell.
EB: When exporting data from a table that is inside a grid cell, the data should be successfully exported.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the page with the grid and table.
2. Verify that there is a table inside a grid cell.
3. Try to export the data from the table.
4. Observe the exception that is thrown.
